CustomField.description: Hidden field - checkbox formula used to trigger "Implementation| Scheduled| In Blackout flow
CustomField.formula: Blackout_Start_Date__c <= TODAY() && Blackout_End_Date__c > TODAY() && ISBLANK( Assets_Received__c ) && ISBLANK( Final_Reporting_Received__c ) && ISBLANK( Conversion_Assets_Posted__c )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Hidden field - checkbox formula used to trigger "Implementation| Scheduled| In Blackout flow
CustomField.label: In Blackout
